name: Qian
description: creativity and perseverance, heaven; the qualities of a founder and leader.

name: Kun
description: earth; it is beneficial to behave like a quiet mare. The upper class should take initiative to guide and the lower class should follow.

name: Zhun
description: the sprouting of a seed, or difficulty at the beginning. It will be greatly smooth and prosperous after overcoming difficulties by means of perseverance.

name: Meng
description: ignorance or the ignorant one; it is not I who seek the ignorant one, it is he who seeks me, and I won’t advise after the third time; it is advantageous to persist.

name: Xu
description: waiting, needing; being captured in something, like being caught in the rain, but finally all will be well and prosperous if one is sincere and persevering.

name: Song
description: contention, or arguing with sincerity but being hampered or trapped, so it bodes ill to go through to the end.

name: Shi
description: the army (or, the multitude); it is right and propitious for a durable and experienced person to lead it.

name: Bi
description: helping each other; good fortune originated from people helping each other like water covering the land.

name: Xiao Chu
description: little storage, feeding or restraint; the small serves (and plays games with) the large; the small and the large learn how to get along with each other.

name: Lu
description: treading on the tail of the tiger but it does not bite.; it will be smooth and prosperous.

name: Tai
description: peace and prosperity in the form of a good harvest; the small departs and the large approaches, so good fortune and prosperity are expected.

name: Pi
description: blockage or stagnation; the large departs and the small approaches; it is disadvantageous for a gentleman to persist, but good fortune is expected by way of endurance.

name: Tong Ren
description: gathering of people in the wild (or outside the city gate or under the heaven); it will be smooth and prosperous and it is advantageous to persist as a gentleman.

name: Da You
description: great possessing (great harvest or full storage); it will be greatly smooth and prosperous.

name: Qian
description: modesty, or being humble; it is smooth and prosperous, and it is advantageous for a gentleman to go through to the end.

name: Yu
description: satisfaction or happiness; it is advantageous to establish marquisates and dispatch armies.

name: Sui
description: following (i.e., being followed or to follow); it will be greatly smooth and prosperous, and it is advantageous to persist.

name: Gu
description: troubles caused by the father or the mother; it is advantageous to cross a great river and go forward three days before and three days after the start.

name: Lin
description: approaching from above with condescending tenderness, or being overseen from a high place. It will be greatly smooth and prosperous, and it is advantageous to persist.

name: Guan
description: watching or showing; after ablution but before the sacrifice, people look up to him with sincerity and respect.

name: Shi He
description: biting and joining, or eliminating by biting; it is advantageous to go to law.

name: Bi
description: grace or adornment, like a fire illuminating the foot of a mountain; it is of little advantage to go somewhere.

name: Bo
description: peeling off layer by layer; it is disadvantageous to move forward.

name: Fu
description: returning, or one masculine line returning; it will be smooth and prosperous without illness.

name: Wu Wang
description: without falsehood or being loyal; it will be greatly smooth and prosperous, and it is advantageous to persist.

name: Da Chu
description: great storage, great accumulation; it is advantageous to persist, and it is auspicious to eat at home and cross a great river.

name: Yi
description: nourishing (the chin or the body); it is auspicious to persist and watch the nourishing and self-nourishing.

name: Da Guo
description: great excess or overwhelmingly great; the ridgepole is overweighed and bent, so it is advantageous to go somewhere and it will be smooth and prosperous.

name: Kan
description: a pit (or, a trap) falling into a pit; it is smooth and prosperous in the heart as the action is valued.

name: Li
description: brightness, or attaching to; it is advantageous to persist and keep a cow.

name: Xian
description: mutual influence, or all; it is smooth and prosperous, it is advantageous to persist, and it is auspicious to take a wife.

name: Heng
description: longevity or lasting; it is smooth and prosperous without fault, and it is advantageous to persist and go somewhere.

name: Dun
description: retreat or withdrawal; it will be smooth and prosperous, and it is of little advantage to persist.

name: Da Zhuang
description: largeness and strength, or the masculine is strong; the great strength must be guided onto a right track.

name: Jin
description: advance or promotion; the marquis is granted many horses during the day with three audiences.

name: Ming Yi
description: brightness being wounded; it is advantageous to persist in difficulty.

name: Jia Ren
description: family members; it is advantageous for a woman to persist.

name: Kui
description: disjunction or mutual alienation; there is little that will be smooth and prosperous.

name: Jian
description: difficulty or obstruction; it is advantageous to be in the southwest and disadvantageous to be in the northeast, and it is advantageous to meet a great person and persist.

name: Xie
description: release, or relief from danger; it is advantageous to be in the southwest, and if going back soon it will be auspicious, but if there is somewhere to go, it is better to act quickly.

name: Sun
description: decrease; sincerity brings great good fortune without fault, it is advantageous to persist and go somewhere, but how to do it? Two plates of food can be used.

name: Yi
description: increase; it is advantageous to go somewhere and cross a great river.

name: Guai
description: breakthrough or resolute; it is ominous to face the king's court with weapons showing, but sincerity will bring good fortune, and though there is danger, it is best to act from one's own city, and it is disadvantageous to use force.

name: Gou
description: meeting or encounter; the feminine is strong, do not take this woman.

name: Cui
description: gathering or assembly; it is smooth and prosperous to meet the king at the temple, it is advantageous to meet a great person and persist, and a great sacrifice brings good fortune, it is advantageous to go somewhere.

name: Sheng
description: ascending or promotion; it will be greatly smooth and prosperous, it is advantageous to meet a great person, have no anxiety, and march south will be auspicious.

name: Kun
description: confinement or exhaustion; it will be smooth and prosperous for a great person to persist, but speaking is not believed.

name: Jing
description: the well; the city may be changed but not the well, it neither decreases nor increases, people come and go drawing water, if the rope is too short or the pitcher breaks it is ominous.

name: Ge
description: revolution or molting; when the day comes, it is believed, greatly smooth and prosperous, it is advantageous to persist, and regret disappears.

name: Ding
description: the cauldron or the ding; it is greatly auspicious and smooth and prosperous.

name: Zhen
description: thunder or shock; it will be smooth and prosperous, but when thunder comes, one is frightened and then laughs, frightening one hundred miles but not dropping the sacrificial spoon and ladle.

name: Gen
description: stopping or keeping still like a mountain; one stops at the back and does not see the person, walks in the courtyard and does not see the person, without fault.

name: Jian
description: gradual progress or development; the maiden gets married, good fortune, it is advantageous to persist.

name: Gui Mei
description: marrying maiden; to march will be ominous, it is of no advantage.

name: Feng
description: abundance or prosperity; it will be smooth and prosperous, the king arrives at it, do not worry, it is like the sun at noon.

name: Lu
description: traveler or stranger; it is of little smoothness and prosperity, but it is auspicious for a traveler to persist.

name: Xun
description: wind or gentle penetration; it is of little smoothness and prosperity, it is advantageous to go somewhere and meet a great person.

name: Dui
description: joy or lake; it will be smooth and prosperous, it is advantageous to persist.

name: Huan
description: dispersion or dissolution; it will be smooth and prosperous, the king arrives at the temple, it is advantageous to cross a great river and persist.

name: Jie
description: limitation or节制; it will be smooth and prosperous, but limitation cannot persist if it is bitter.

name: Zhong Fu
description: inner truth or sincerity; even pigs and fish are moved, good fortune, it is advantageous to cross a great river and persist.

name: Xiao Guo
description: small excess or passing over a little; it will be smooth and prosperous, it is advantageous to persist, one can do small things but not great things, the flying bird leaves its sound, it is not advisable to go up but down, greatly auspicious.

name: Ji Ji
description: after completion or already crossed; it is of little smoothness and prosperity, it is advantageous to persist, at the beginning it is auspicious but at the end it is disordered.

name: Wei Ji
description: before completion or not yet crossed; it will be smooth and prosperous, but the little fox almost crosses and wets its tail, it is of no advantage.
